    Delauney Triangulation for Voronoi Partition for implementation in Simulated Mobile Network Data.

    November, 2021

    Talk, International Conference Use of R in Official Statistics (uRosConf 2021), Bucharest, Romania

    simviz: a package to visualize simulated telecommunication mobile network event data.

    November, 2021

    Contributed Talk, International Conference Use of R in Official Statistics (uRosConf 2021), Bucharest, Romania

    This talk was given jointly with D. Salgado, M. Necula, B. Oancea, and S. Barragan at the uROS Conference 2021. The simviz package was introduced as a R library to simulate and visualize tele-communication networks.
